ingredients.item: ¼ x 20g pack dill, chopped, plus extra to serve
1 x 135g tin Conserverie Parmentier Sardines in Olive Oil with Herbs

instructions.step: Thinly slice the onion then soak in a bowl of cold water for 10 minutes to mellow its fl avour slightly; drain thoroughly. Meanwhile, trim the fennel and slice as thinly as possible (use a mandoline if you have one). Toss the drained onion and fennel in a bowl with the chopped dill, lemon zest and juice, and the oil; season.

Heat a grill or griddle pan (or barbecue) over a high heat, then toast the bread until charred (about 1½ minutes on each side). Rub one side of the toast with the garlic, then top with the fennel salad. Divide the sardines between the toast slices and drizzle with a little oil from the tin; season. Pick off some extra dill fronds to scatter over the toasts and serve immediately.
